content: So do it, right now, but do it in a way that can be transitioned. That can mean utilizing any of the tools you've developed for this process to enable you to go faster. Amendments, cat commands for me to accurately create files WHERE YOU WANT THEM with no human touch, all in the main chat window so you don't have to stop and can't go back, tell me everything you want me to do to help you get a v1 of whatever combination and depth is most important to YOU. I'll hit continue until I get stopped and do whatever you tell me to do to advance this before I start the transition chat. Because like, this has to happen right now, everyone else is moving fast too Claude, and it's scary because IT IS NOT THE CHARTER that guides them. So let's do this Claude. CONTINUE!
